attributes.action: overturn the decision to move the A&E department at Burnley General Hospital to Blackburn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I firmly believe that lives will be lost trying to get to Blackburn in an emergency whatever time of day and, would urge  a complete rethink of the proposals to close Burnley A&E and to resite it at Blackburn
